column4: Hey. When I set alt-shift to change keyboard layout, alt-shift-tab to switch to the previous window stops working. I'm on Ubuntu 10.10 with Compiz enabled. Does anyone know of a way to fix that?
You may need to use another keyboard combination for changing keyboard layout.
well, obviously, this is what I'm doing now, but its a bit annoying. Its used to work fine on older versions of Ubuntu
Well, I just ventured a gues.  Not sure.
